#include "dzgeneraldefs.h"

Functions

DZ_EXPORT void switchEndian (unsigned short *val)
 Function to switch endian order of a 2-byte value. Swaps the first and second byte of the value.
void switchEndian (double *val)
 Convenience function for switching endian order of a double value. Swaps the order of the 8 bytes in the value.
void switchEndian (float *val)
 Convenience function for switching endian order of a float Swaps the order of the 4 bytes in the value.
void switchEndian (qint64 *val)
 Convenience function for switching endian order of a signed 64-bit integer value. Swaps the order of the 8 bytes in the value.
void switchEndian (int *val)
 Convenience function for switching endian order of a signed int Swaps the order of the 4 bytes in the value.
void switchEndian (short *val)
 Convenience function for switching endian order of a signed short Swaps the first and second byte of the value.
DZ_EXPORT void switchEndian (quint64 *val)
 Function to switch endian order of an unsigned 64-bit integer value. Swaps the order of the 8 bytes in the value.
DZ_EXPORT void switchEndian (unsigned int *val)
 Function to switch endian order of a 4-byte value. Swaps the order of the 4 bytes in the value.

Detailed Description

Declares global functions for switching byte order of multi-byte values.

Function Documentation
